mapper.select: SELECT C.ROW_NUM, C.COMMENT_NO, C.ANONY_NO, C.CREATE_DATE, C.CONTENT, C.STATE, C.DEPTH, C.GROUP_NO, C.EMP_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC, CREATE_DATE DESC) AS ROW_NUM, C.COMMENT_NO, C.ANONY_NO, C.CREATE_DATE, C.CONTENT, C.STATE, C.DEPTH, C.GROUP_NO, C.EMP_NO FROM EMPLOYEES E INNER JOIN COMMENTS C ON E.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE ANONY_NO = #{anoyNo}) C WHERE C.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
